pricing.passionatedesc: Ideal for art enthusiasts curious about an artist or the value of a work.
pricing.expertdesc: Businesses or experts with significant needs requiring a bespoke offer.

infoband.title: Who Our Solution Is For ?
infoband.passionatedesc: Individuals curious about the art world, having artworks to appraise, in the context of an acquisition or inheritance.
infoband.expertdesc: Experts wanting to evaluate an artwork, share references with clients, or simply cross-check their estimation in seconds.
infoband.commissairedesc: Auctioneers organizing sales for any art object, wanting to validate the estimates of their sale and then organize it in the best way.

product.supertitle: A Platform to Unlock the Potential of Data, Art, and AI
product.superdesc: The art market is decentralized. Traditional tools are no longer sufficient. Only artificial intelligence allows you to quickly contextualize a work, compare it to recent global sales, interpret its evaluation, and then optimize your sale.
product.descautomatiestim: Search by submitting a simple image or a detailed description; the AI will find identical works and provide an accurate estimation.
product.sol1automatiestim: Automatic estimation in a few clicks
product.sol2automatiestim: No prior knowledge required for over 80% accuracy
product.descsearch: Search for an artist, a specific work, or any object, we will find it.
product.sol3search: Searches in 120 countries worldwide, we handle the homogenization
product.sol4search: Temporal trend analysis up to 30 years
product.descoptim: Once your works are estimated, organize your future, ongoing, and past sales with our management platform.
product.pain3optim: Limited view of your sale's potential
product.pain4optim: No tool to track your sales
product.sol1optim: Organization and creation of your upcoming sales catalog
product.sol2optim: Management and sending of newsletters/catalogs to your address book
product.sol3optim: Inventory management of your lots and communication with sellers
product.sol4optim: Tracking of future, ongoing, and past sales

about.h2_title_2: Generative AI at the Service of Art
about.mission_statement_1: At {COMPANY_NAME}, we are revolutionizing the art market by combining our unique expertise in both the art domain and artificial intelligence. Our mission is to streamline and bring transparency to the art market, whether for sellers or buyers.
about.quote: "The call for greater openness and accountability has come from all sectors of the art world, including artists, collectors, and buyers."
about.mission_statement_2: We understand the challenges faced by individuals and experts in the art world. Sellers often lack knowledge about the value of their items, while experts are constantly searching for exceptional works. This manual and slow search process limits the potential for future sales.
about.mission_statement_3: {COMPANY_NAME} addresses these issues by offering innovative solutions through three main avenues:
about.aim_1: Enable individuals and institutions to quickly and accurately estimate the value of their artworks with minimal knowledge.
about.aim_2: Provide art experts with advanced and transparent price analysis tools, facilitating the understanding of valuation and subsequent sale of artworks.
about.aim_3: Create a unified and easy-to-use platform for auctions, increasing experts' ability to attract art enthusiasts from around the world.
about.how_1: We leverage the most advanced artificial intelligence models, including language models (LLMs) and statistical models, to analyze artworks. These technologies allow us to process vast volumes of data in record time, identify common factors among artworks, and compare them scientifically.
about.how_2: Our expertise in both the art and technology domains allows us to offer unprecedented solutions. We are the first to propose such a combination of technologies to solve age-old problems in the art market. Our tools include:
about.tool_1: Extraction, aggregation, and homogenization of art data worldwide to make them comparable.
about.tool_2: Interpretable artificial intelligence models that break down each component of an artwork's price.
about.tool_3: Studies of long-term temporal and geographical trends of an artwork, an artist, or any object available for sale.
about.how_3: We also integrate human expertise for the most complex cases, ensuring the best possible outcomes. By combining the power of AI with human expertise, we guarantee unparalleled accuracy and reliability in the estimation and sale of artworks.
about.contact_us: Want to learn more or join this adventure? Contact us.

advantages.title: Increase your sales without increasing your costs
advantages.desc_1_1: Iterative search limited by traditional tools?
advantages.desc_1_2: Accurately estimate your works in seconds
advantages.desc_1_3: Search by image or text, no prior expertise needed

advantages.desc_2_3: Diagnose art piece price through each of its components

advantages.desc_3_2: Organize your catalog in a simple and complete tool
advantages.desc_3_3: Add/Edit/Delete your lots and inventory in no time
advantages.desc_3: A simple and efficient exchange tool to monitor your sale and communicate with market players
advantages.desc_4_1: Daily management preventing you from planning your next sale?
advantages.desc_4_2: Manage your buyer/seller communication in a few clicks
advantages.desc_4_3: Save time and minimize your costs with a single platform

cgv.desc7: Products benefit from the legal warranty of conformity and the warranty against hidden defects. In case of non-conformity or defect, you can return the products for repair, replacement, or refund.
